mapper.select: select m.order_num, m.genie_id, p.product_name, m.recipient_name, m.recipient_phone, m.recipient_address, m.recipient_request, m.recipient_delivery_status, m.order_price, m.order_qty, m.order_writedate from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id = #{param2}) p on m.product_id = p.product_id where recipient_delivery_status != 'delivered' order by m.order_writedate desc

select m.order_num, m.genie_id, p.product_name, m.recipient_delivery_status, m.order_price, m.order_qty, m.order_writedate from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id = #{param2}) p on m.product_id = p.product_id where recipient_delivery_status = 'delivered' order by m.order_writedate desc
select count(genie_id) cnt from account where genie_id=#{genie_id}
mapper.insert: insert into account(ROLE, genie_id, genie_pwd) values(#{ROLE},#{genie_id}, #{genie_pwd})

insert into seller(genie_id, company_name, ceo_name, seller_tel, seller_email, seller_website, seller_reg_no, seller_address, seller_status) values(#{genie_id}, #{company_name}, #{ceo_name}, #{seller_tel}, #{seller_email}, #{seller_website}, #{seller_reg_no}, #{seller_address}, #{seller_status});

insert into product(genie_id, product_category, product_tag, product_name, product_price, product_info, product_quantity, product_image1, product_image2, product_image3, product_mbti) values(#{genie_id}, #{product_category}, #{product_tag}, #{product_name}, ${product_price}, #{product_info}, ${product_quantity}, #{product_image1}, #{product_image2}, #{product_image3}, #{product_mbti})
mapper.select: select a.genie_id, a.genie_pwd, s.company_name, a.ROLE from account a join seller s on a.genie_id=s.genie_id where a.genie_id=#{genie_id} and a.withdrawal=1;

select i.genie_id, i.product_id, p.product_name, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_status, i.inquiry_writedate from inquiry i join product p on i.product_id=p.product_id where i.product_id in(select product_id from product where genie_id=#{param2}) order by i.product_id asc

select ifnull(sum(order_price), 0) from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id = #{param1}) p on m.product_id = p.product_id where MONTH(order_writedate)=MONTH(now()) and YEAR(order_writedate)=YEAR(now());

select date_format(order_writedate, '%m-%d') as month_day, sum(order_price) as total_sales from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id = #{param1}) p on m.product_id = p.product_id group by month_day order by month_day
select count(order_num) order_cnt from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id = #{param1}) p on m.product_id = p.product_id;

select product_name from (select seller_id, product_id, product_name, count(product_id) as sold_cnt from (select m.order_num, m.genie_id orderer_id, m.product_id, p.product_name, p.genie_id seller_id from myorder m join product p on m.product_id = p.product_id where p.genie_id=#{param1}) a group by 1,2,3 order by sold_cnt desc limit 1) b;

select count(order_num) delivery_hold from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id=#{param3})p on m.product_id = p.product_id where recipient_delivery_status = 'delivery_prepared';

select count(order_num) today_order from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id=#{param3})p on m.product_id = p.product_id where date_format(order_writedate, "%Y-%m-%d") = curdate();

select count(order_num) delivery_hold from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id=#{param3})p on m.product_id = p.product_id where recipient_delivery_status = 'delivering';

select product_image1, product_name, sold_counts, total_sales from (select product_id, count(product_id) sold_counts, sum(order_price) total_sales from myorder group by product_id) a join (select distinct m.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_image1 from myorder m join product p on m.product_id = p.product_id where p.genie_id=#{param1}) b on a.product_id = b.product_id order by total_sales desc limit 3
select seller_status from seller where genie_id = #{param4}

select ifnull(sum(m.order_price), 0) monthly_revenue from myorder m join (select product_id, genie_id as seller_id, product_name from product where genie_id=#{param1}) p on m.product_id = p.product_id where date_format(m.order_writedate, '%y-%m') = month(curdate())

select product_category, count(product_id) as sold_counts from (select m.genie_id, m.product_id, m.order_price, m.order_writedate, p.genie_id seller_id, p.product_category, p.product_name from myorder m join (select * from product where genie_id=#{param1}) p on m.product_id = p.product_id) a group by 1 order by sold_counts desc

select count(product_id) cnt from product
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
